original_title: Belle Brezing and the Gilded Age of the Bluegrass
overview: The story of Belle Brezing, the Lexington Madam who ran a Victorian era brothel, is explored. The film details Brezing's journey from hardscrabble youth to the Baroness of the Brothel, while becoming the nearly undeniable inspiration for Belle Watling from "Gone with the Wind."
title: Belle Brezing and the Gilded Age of the Bluegrass
